title: Play This Recent Trend in McDonald's Stock
text:
McDonald's (MCD) is having a down dayHowever, for the past few weeks when the stock has tested the $216 area it has poppedI still believe MCD eventually is heading to $225-230, but for now a trip above $220 is probably on the docketThe Sept13 220 calls cost about $1.50. When MCD gets to $221, these will be worth $3.00-3.50, something I think could...
